name: Fairy Cubes
description:
Fairy Cubes is a highly innovative and addictive 3D skill-based puzzle game. Combining outstanding levels, colorful graphics and great audio effects it is one of the most original and fun games in the Mac Store.
Fairy Cubes combines mahjong and match three game-plays with accurate controls in a 3D environment.

- 45 levels
- Beautiful 3D graphics
- Easy, normal and hard game modes
- Great soundtracks and audio effects
- Fun and addictive game-play elements


Gamers Quotes

"You'll find yourself playing "Just one more" level, and then some." - Guy

“I like this game. It’s worth every penny” - Tamas
